title: Clothing and customer service
text:
I bought over 700.00 of clothing shoes etc in one day.  When it arrived, several items were defective like one sleeve sewn shut cannot wear it.  One halter had darts all through one side and not the other so many sewing issues like that. I wrote 3 emails with no response cannot find any other customer service or refund area. I want a refund and impossible to get. I will never shop here again ever plus if you do get refund info they want all these pics downloaded and boxed and sent to China and I don‚Äôt have the time or printer to print a shipping receipt so I have to pay more money to send it back. It‚Äôs a total rip off I‚Äôd be fine if they‚Äôd answer me and refund me something fair  for all the stuff wrong out of over 700.00 I paid to buy everything just show you care somewhat.

Respectfully,
Julie street

title: Never got my refund
text: Ordered $200 worth of clothes back in November. Some couldn‚Äôt fit so obviously I returned them. I‚Äôve been waiting for my refund since then. The app says the refund was processed and refunded on December 21st but i‚Äôve got nothing. I put in a claim on the app since there‚Äôs no physical customer service phone number only an app robot. So i put my claim in and a day later the robot says ‚Äúafter carefully checking‚Äù the refund was processed‚Ä¶ The refund is nowhere to be found so I replied that I checked again and nothing. I also asked if they possibly added the money to the wrong card. Again the robot says the refund was processed. I called my bank because don‚Äôt play with my money.  Currently in the process of a claim through my bank for my refund. Never had any problems until this. Y‚Äôall are a huge company‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs 2024. A customer service number is essential.
